DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Dexamethasone Added Usual Infiltration With Bupivacaine Inguinal Hernia Repair Mesh
DOC.detailed_description: This study : control , prospective , randomize double blind . Randomized experimental study patient schedule undergo unilateral inguinal hernia repair meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion invite participate . At time admission study , assign randomly one two branch intervention : ( Group A ) : infiltration 0.5 % bupivacaine dose 1.5 mg / kg body weight dilute physiological solution final volume 30 ml . ( Group B ) : infiltration 0.5 % bupivacaine dose 1.5 mg / kg body weight + dexamethasone 2 ml ( 8 mg ) dilute physiological solution final volume 30 ml . Pain evaluate visual analogue scale 0-10 measure 1st postoperative hour , every 2 hour discharge , discharge , 8 hour , 24 hour , 48 hour 8 day . It also evaluate analgesic consumption , complication labor return
